categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Hold was a male Human Sith Lord who served the Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War against the Galactic Republic, where he could be found on Vaiken Spacedock and trained other Sith Warriors.
Lord Hold appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a trainer for the Sith Warrior class on Vaiken Spacedock.
